alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Decatur; Rawlins; Sherman; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued July 26 at 9:05PM CDT until July 26 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A DUST STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM MDT/1000 PM CDT/ FOR CHEYENNE...NORTHERN THOMAS...RAWLINS...SOUTHWESTERN DECATUR AND NORTHEASTERN SHERMAN COUNTIES IN NORTHWESTERN KANSAS... At 804 PM MDT/904 PM CDT/, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Benkelman to 7 miles south of McDonald to 6 miles northwest of Brewster, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Near zero visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph. SOURCE...Trained Spotter. At 755 PM MDT, estimated 70 mph gust with blowing dust 13 miles north of Edson. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. Highways impacted include Highways 25, 27, and 36. This dust channel will be near... Gem around 950 PM CDT. Rexford around 1000 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this dust channel include Wheeler, Blakeman and Beardsley. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, then pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake. Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE! Strong to severe thunderstorms are also possible behind this wall of dust. Keep updated with this quickly evolving situation.
